description: Indicates whether this request can only add a new Supplier Contract Lease Amendment Type

Supplier_Contract_Lease_Amendment_TypeOb.description: Display information used to describe an instance of an object. This 'optional' information is for outbound descriptive purposes only and is not processed on inbound Workday Web Services requests.

The unique identifier type. Each "ID" for an instance of an object contains a type and a value. A single instance of an object can have multiple "ID" but only a single "ID" per "type".  Some "types" require a reference to a parent instance.
Contains a unique identifier for an instance of an object.

validation.validation: You must enter a unique name for the Supplier Contract Lease Amendment Type.

validation.validation: Enter a name for the Supplier Contract Lease Amendment Type.

Supplier_Contract_Lease_Amendment_Type_D.description: Description of the Supplier Contract Lease Amendment Type
Indicates whether this type enables an extension of the lease contract end date
Indicates whether this type enables non-CPI payment changes to the contract
